page.title: 14RECREATION C. CROOKHAM
page.content: Leisure is an important part of people's lives in Church Crookham. We discovered many places where people spend their leisure time. They were Tweseldown Race Couse,The Peter Driver Sports centre and Redfields Nursery. A survey showed people visiting Tweseldown were Point to Point Racing,Three Day Eventing ,Fun Runs, Pony Club Meetings, Scrambling, Charity Walks, Kite Flying and Dog Walking. Avondale Tennis Club is in Ewshot Lane and moved to its present site from Avondale Road in Fleet. It has over a hundred playing members and a thriving junior section with coaching facilities. There are six courts with weather surfaces and floodlights. Members mainly come from Church Crookham and Fleet.
